name: Sheri Berke
what_you_do: Carrd is a platform that allows users to create simple, one-page websites for various purposes such as profiles, landing pages, portfolios, and forms.
who_you_serve: Carrd serves individuals and businesses looking to establish an online presence with minimal effort, including entrepreneurs, freelancers, and creatives.
business_focus: Carrd is a platform that allows users to create simple, one-page websites for various purposes such as profiles, landing pages, portfolios, and forms. (website building)
